articles.title: Precious Metals Plays: GDX Offers Broader Exposure and Less Volatility Than SLVP
articles.mainIdea: Precious Metals Plays: GDX Offers Broader Exposure and Less Volatility Than SLVP
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Precious Metals Plays: GDX Offers Broader Exposure and Less Volatility Than SLVP. iShares MSCI Global Silver and Metals Miners ETF (SLVP) and VanEck Gold Miners ETF (GDX) differ most on assets under management (AUM), liquidity, and their focus on silver versus gold mining companies. Related tickers mentioned: GC=F.

articles.title: Gold Or Silver ETFs: What Could Rally More in 2026?
articles.mainIdea: Gold Or Silver ETFs: What Could Rally More in 2026?
articles.summary: Zacks: Gold Or Silver ETFs: What Could Rally More in 2026?. Gold vs Silver ETFs in 2026: Both hit records in Dec. 2025, but silver's supply deficit and industrial demand may give SLV, SIVR an edge over GLD, IAU. Related tickers mentioned: DX-Y.NYB, GC=F, GDXJ, GLD, IAU, SI=F, SIL, SILJ, SIVR, SLV.
